channel.title: Homes on Karttikeya Mangalam
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Karttikeya Mangalam

item.description: About Me I’m a PhD student in Computer Science at the Department of Electrical Engineering & Computer Sciences (EECS) at University of California, Berkeley advised by Prof. Jitendra Malik. Last summers, I was a research intern at the Toyota Research Institute, Mountain View (TRI) working with Dr. Adrien Gaidon on pedestrian behaviour modelling & prediction for self driving cars. Last year, I was a master’s student in Computer Science at Stanford University working on pedestrian locomotion forecasting as a Research Assitant with Prof.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: I have worked as a Academic mentor in Counselling Service, IITK for PHY102 : Introduction to Mechanics in my sophomore year (2015 - 2016) in IIT Kanpur. I was responsible for providing academic support to freshmen in terms of one-on-one mentoring and remedial classes for concept strengtening, problem solving and revision.
